name: Life Game - Adulthood
description:
Life Game is a prototype for a game we worked on around 2015. It was meant to have three parts – child, teen and adult – which would all play in sequence, each section involving different gameplay. The game can be wholly played with mouse.

Childhood and Teenage Years can be played here!

Adulthood

Live out your adult life in this text-based ending to Life Game. Choose four actions to undertake a year, balancing work, relationships and hobbies... Or lean into however you want to spend your time! The game ends when you pass away. 

NOTE - The prototype is playable from beginning to end, but it may have bugs or be missing features.
